text: The big lie () is a lie of the truth, used as a propaganda technique. The German expression was created by Adolf Hitler, when he wrote his 1925 book Mein Kampf, to describe the use of a lie so big that no one would believe it. ==Related pages== * Disinformation * Holocaust denial * Holodomor denial * Conspiracy theory * Bosnian genocide denial * Rwandan genocide denial * Cambodian genocide denial ==References== Category:Nazism Category:Fascism Category:Politics Category:Rhetoric
title: Big lie
